;
;Additional "DIRTROAD" Intersection Solutions added 041804 ~ Tropod, many and varied.
; Necessary files duplicated, referenced files & IDs changed to seperate "DIRTROAD" network from Road network.
;Includes minor portions created by the7trumpets.
; 0x5E###### Designations
[RoadDirtRoadIntersectionSolutions]
;dirtroad diag into road 90
TYPE1=0x02000002,0x00010000,0x5760D600,1,1
TYPE2=0x00000202,0x01000000,0x5760D600,0,1
TYPE3=0x00020200,0x00000001,0x5760D600,3,1
TYPE4=0x02020000,0x00000100,0x5760D600,2,1
